common.tagline: District-Level Oxygen Intelligence for a Greener India

footer.aboutText: Vayura provides district-level oxygen intelligence across India, enabling data-driven climate action through transparent science.
footer.madeWith: Made with care for a greener India
footer.quote: Every tree counts. Every breath matters.

home.heroDescription: Discover your district's environmental health with AI-powered analysis. Track oxygen demand, soil quality, and join the movement to restore balance.
home.step1Desc: Choose any Indian district to view its environmental report card.
home.step2Desc: Our AI calculates the precise oxygen gap based on population and pollution.
home.step3Desc: Contribute trees directly or donate to verified local NGOs.
home.ctaDescription: Join thousands of citizens using Vayura to monitor their local environment and take verified climate action.

features.districtAnalysisDesc: Comprehensive environmental health scores and oxygen deficit calculations for every Indian district.
features.aiPoweredDesc: Google Gemini intelligently aggregates data from multiple government sources for accuracy.
features.treeContributionDesc: Upload tree plantation photos analyzed by AI to verify your environmental impact.
features.ngoPartnersDesc: Donate to verified organizations with transparent impact tracking and accountability.
features.leaderboardDesc: Track state rankings based on oxygen self-sufficiency and reforestation progress.
features.methodologyDesc: All formulas, data sources, and assumptions are clearly explained for full transparency.
features.plantTreeDesc: Take direct action by planting native trees in deforested areas with verified tracking.
features.donateTreeDesc: Support local verified NGOs to plant and maintain trees on your behalf.
features.myContributionsDesc: Track your personal planting history, certificates, and impact milestones.

methodology.title: Methodology
methodology.subtitle: Transparent Science Behind Vayura
methodology.soilFactorDesc: Poor soil = less natural O₂ sources (1.0 - 1.6×)
methodology.adjustedDemandFormula: Base Demand × AQI Factor × Soil Factor × Disaster Factor
methodology.treeSupplyAdjusted: Adjusted by soil quality (healthier soil = healthier trees)
methodology.dataSourcesDesc: Vayura uses a multi-tier data fetching approach
methodology.primarySourceDesc: Intelligently aggregates data from multiple government sources
methodology.fallbackSourceDesc: Built-in government published data and statistical estimates
methodology.assumptionsDesc: All calculations are based on the following assumptions
methodology.disclaimerText: Vayura provides educational estimates based on available data and scientific models. The oxygen calculations and environmental metrics are not medical advice, not policy guidance, subject to data availability, and are estimates only. Always verify critical information with official sources and domain experts.
